name: evelina-artist
description: Evelina is a Moldova painter who specializes on oil painting. She has more than 6 years of experience of painting.

scripts.dev: node --input-type=module -e "import cli from './node_modules/@tinacms/cli/dist/index.js'; cli.runExit(['dev', '-c', 'npx astro dev'])"
scripts.build: node --input-type=module -e "import cli from './node_modules/@tinacms/cli/dist/index.js'; cli.runExit(['build'])" && astro build
